review: OMG!!!! I love the fire stick!! It's just like the Fire TV, except it was cheaper.  But with the same shows, same quality of shows, same great product.  Love, love, love it!!! I am totally cancelling my cable service when the contract ends!  I have games, movies, weather, news, exercise, and tv shows, ALL COMMERCIAL FREE, and 1,000s of choices to choose from!! This is great!
author: K. Y. Phillips "Mrs. P"

review: Cool concept, and very compact, but there are some limitations, such as the way the apps (Netflix, YouTube, etc.) are implemented. The remote with the easy caption access is good, but the rewind functionality is poorly done.

review: Love my Fire TV Stick! Easy set up and loads of available Prime programming. We were Prime subscribers for the shipping benefits, but we're enjoying the other perks of which we were not even aware when we subscribed!
